# LLM Capability Framework (LCF)
> A standard for mapping tasks to the most efficient model, token strategy, and reasoning layer.

## Core Documentation
- [Layer 1: Extraction](/1_Capability_Layers/layer_1_extraction.md): Deterministic parsing with distilled models.
- [Layer 6: Agency](/1_Capability_Layers/layer_6_agency.md): Recursive decomposition and orchestration.

## Patterns
- [Two-Pass Execution](/2_Architectural_Patterns/scout_auditor_pattern/): Separating the Scout from the Auditor.
- [Prompt Contract Integration](https://github.com/m3dcodie/prompt-contract): The protocol for enforcing these standards.
